data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I'm a redhead, and I've got all the usual qualities that go along with that. My ____ is ____ pale, and ____ easily. You ____ practically ____ my ____ through ____ skin! I ____ have ____ of ____, ____ brilliant ____ eyes. My Irish blood is to blame!
data.partBlankContent: I'm a redhead, and I've got all the usual qualities that go along with that. My sk__ is ul___ pale, and bu___ easily. You c__ practically s__ my ve___ through m_ skin! I al__ have to__ of frec____, a__ brilliant gr___ eyes. My Irish blood is to blame!
data.answer: 我是红头发，而且我拥有与红头发相关的所有品质。我的皮肤非常苍白，而且容易皮肤发红。你几乎可以透过我的皮肤看到我的血管! 我也有很多雀斑，还有明亮的绿色眼睛。这都怪我的爱尔兰血统!
